title: Implement Dashboard and Analytics Features
description: Develop comprehensive dashboard and analytics functionality for service providers including earnings tracking, booking patterns, customer insights, and performance metrics.

effort_estimate.justification: Creating dashboard and analytics features requires implementing data aggregation, reporting capabilities, and visualization-ready data structures for service providers.

user_stories: As a service provider, I want to monitor earnings so that I can track my business performance
As a service provider, I need to analyze booking patterns so that I can optimize my schedule
As a service provider, I want customer insights so that I can improve service quality
business_rules: Earnings data must be aggregated from payment records
Booking patterns must be analyzed by time periods and services
Customer insights must be derived from booking and review data
Performance metrics must be calculated and presented accurately
Dashboard data must be filtered by tenant context
edge_cases: Handling large datasets for performance reporting
Calculating earnings with different currency conversions
Analyzing booking patterns across multiple time periods
Generating customer insights from review data
Ensuring dashboard data privacy and tenant isolation

acceptance_criteria: Earnings tracking dashboard with payment data
Booking patterns analysis by service and time
Customer insights from reviews and booking history

blocking_information.blocking_reason: Booking and payment data must be available to generate meaningful analytics

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement dashboard and analytics features as defined in FR-4.1 to FR-4.4 of the BRD. Include comprehensive reporting capabilities for service providers. Ensure data privacy and tenant isolation in all dashboard views.
additional_context.design_references: Dashboard and analytics requirements from BRD and service provider journey from User Journeys
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure dashboard data is properly filtered by tenant context and that sensitive financial data is protected
